div.div: Where can I get information about COVID -19?

p.a: Center of Disease Control and Prevention

div.p: All literature and updates share the same messages summarized below:
● Increase education to students on proper handwashing techniques and the frequency of handwashing necessary to prevent the spread of illness.
● Have staff use gloves if cleaning accidents or bathrooms.
● Implement more stringent cleaning precautions with a diluted bleach solution.
● Encourage staying at home and being 'fever free' for 24 hours.

div.div: What is the plan for Solon Springs School?

ul.li: Solon Springs School is Closed - Alternative/Homebound Learning will be implemented March 19th.
Solon Springs School is closed for the duration of our Public Health Emergency.

All athletic and co-curricular practices, meetings, competitions, performances, field trips, weekend events and community use of district facilities are also cancelled for the duration of this Public Health Emergency

div.div: How does my child work from home?

ul.li: Students should check their school email every day! Many teachers have already emailed students.
Use of Class Dojo, Google Classroom, Zoom, Google Meet, email, and phone calls will be used by school staff to communicate with students and parents.
wideopenschools.org is a collection of free education resources for families and teachers.
Physical packets of classroom material are provided to students/families without an internet connection.
The school has increased coverage of their wifi network to cover most of the eastern parking lot on Baldwin Ave.
Internet access for those without is being researched at this time.
Astrea Assistance Programs, including free internet access to those who qualify and are within their service area.

Solon Springs School will provide free Breakfast & Lunch for all students enrolled in school and all children aged 18 and younger. If you have a need, breakfast & lunch can be delivered to you while school is suspended. The delivery will include lunch for the current day and breakfast for the following day. Meals are being delivered starting on March 19th to families who have indicated need.
Please call 715-378-2263 ex. 254 and let Mrs. Latvala know your name and how many you need.
We will get meals delivered on a weekly schedule between 11:00 a.m. and 1:00 p.m.
While school is closed, teachers will be working remotely.

Teachers are available each school day via phone, email, and internet. They are sending information with the work materials going home. Teachers want to stay connected with you and your child. Staff email list

li.a: Staff Email Addresses and Phone Extensions

a.title: Email this link to a friend

p.b: Listed below are several technologies we are using to provide remote learning to your student, under each of the technologies listed,there are both written and video explanations to get you started.

div.p: The school has added a new outdoor wireless access point to provide internet access to students and community members.
This access point provides the same filtered internet content that our internal network does. All connections are logged.
The below map shows the approximate coverage area in the school parking lot.

a.title: Email this link to a friend

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: December 3, 2013

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: Dear Parent/Guardian

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: To better communicate with parents the School District of Solon Springs has an addition to

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: Family Access called Skylert. Skylert is a message system that will give parents

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: important school information by phone, email or SMS texting.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Skylert allows parents to enter phone numbers, e-mail and SMS texting information into

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: Family Access. If there is a mass phone notification, the new phone numbers entered by

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: the parent/guardian will be notified in addition to the phone numbers that have already

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: been provided to the schools. For example, parents can enter the phone number of their

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: day care provider or an emergency contact, such as grandparents, to also receive

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: messages from the School District of Solon Springs.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: You may access Skylert by the following:

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: 1. Log into Family Access. You will find the Skylert link is in the same area as the

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: Grade book, Attendance, and Schedule links.

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: 2. Click on the Skylert link and a page will display all phone numbers and in what

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: situation those phone numbers will be called. As always, should you need to

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: make a phone number change for your child(ren), please contact the individual

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: school where your child(ren) attend.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We trust that you will find Skylert helpful in keeping important people in your child’s life

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: informed of important information.

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: Skylert – School District of Solon Springs Family Contact Service via Telephone and E-Mail

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: IMPORTANT – PLEASE READ: Families can determine which phone numbers and which e-mail

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: accounts receive certain types of communications.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Editing Skylert Settings

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.3em;

p.span: Log into Skyward Family Access through www.solonk12.net go to Parents/Students and then Skyward Family Access. Once logged in, click on Skylert on the General Information menu on the left navigation bar. Your Skylert settings will display. If you desire to make changes, click on Save on the right of screen after you have finished making changes.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Please note that the Primary Phone, Work, Cellular, and home E-mail shown under the Notifications for Primary Guardian are the same pieces of information recorded in our Skyward Student database.

span.style: background-color: transparent; color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 15px; font-style: italic; white-space: pre-wrap; line-height: 1.15;

p.span: Changes that you would like to make to these numbers and e-mail can only be made through the school’s main office.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Save – if you make changes, be sure to click Save before exiting this screen. S

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Emergency notifications will reference events such as safety related incidents and other emergency notifications determined by district administrators. Emergency notifications will be sent only as needed.

span.style: font-size: 15px; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: transparent; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: General notifications are for informational purposes only and will reference various district and campus events and information. In addition, General notifications will be utilized to alert parents of school delay and/or closure due to inclement weather.

h2.a: Vision and Mission for the Staff of the Solon Springs School

a.title: Print article < Vision and Mission for the Staff of the Solon Springs School >
Email this link to a friend

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Vision Statement

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;

i.b: We are a caring community engaged in challenging students to meet their highest potential.

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;
span.i: Embracing the world with open wings we S.O.A.R.

span.style: font-size: 10pt;

font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Mission Statement…

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Therefore we shall:

span.style: font-weight: 400; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;

li.span: Provide a progressive and quality education that meets the needs of each individual student

span.style: font-weight: 400; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;

li.span: Provide a safe and positive environment for everyone

span.style: font-weight: 400; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt;

li.span: Partner and communicate with our communities
